title: How to make cinnamon buns
description: The secret to this sweet teatime treat is the soft, rich, buttery dough. You could use this dough to make fruit loaves or hot cross buns by kneading the fruit into the dough before the first rise and dividing the dough into two loaves or twelve small buns.
ingredients: 15g/1oz fresh yeast or 1½ tsp dried yeast
2 free-range eggs, plus one egg yolk, for glazing
100g/3½oz butter, softened, plus extra for greasing
